short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Authentic Stats extension helps you collect your own X (formerly Twitter) and Pinterest analytics.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Authentic Stats is a reporting tool for influencers. You can create, edit and share your influencer campaign reports with your clients quickly.

The Authentic Stats Chrome Browser Extension helps you collect stats from your Pinterest and X (formerly Twitter) accounts saving you the manual work of taking screenshots.

To use this extension, get a Free Authentic Stats account at https://authenticstats.com

Authentic Stats extension for Google Chrome.
